task.title: Removing Items from a Collection
task.shortdesc: You can remove items from a collection should you decide it no longer belongs in that collection.

context.p: Removing items from a collection gives you the ability to customize which items are in your collections. If you no longer wish for an item to be included in a collection, you can remove it without deletingthe item.

step.cmd: Select a collection in the left Zotero pane
Select the items in the center pane that you want to remove from the collection

choices.choice: Press the Delete key to remove the items from the collection
Right-click the selcted items and select "Remove Item(s) from Collection"

step.info: This only removes the items from the selected collection, not from “My Library” or any other collections.
